definitions: an aviator or aircraft employed in locating or observing enemy positions
shortDefinitions: aviator or aircraft employed in locating or observing enemy positions

definitions: a person who looks for or observes a particular thing as a hobby or job
shortDefinitions: person who looks for or observes particular thing as hobby or job

definitions: a person who observes weather patterns on behalf of an organization

examples.text: the National Weather Service said a spotter had called in to report a tornado touching the ground near Somonauk

definitions: a person who observes or assists a gymnast or weightlifter during a performance or practice in order to minimize the chance of accidents or injuries.
shortDefinitions: person who observes or assists gymnast or weightlifter during performance or practice

definitions: a member of an auto racing team who sits above the track and communicates with the driver by radio about what is happening along the course

examples.text: NASCAR mandated that spotters had to be positioned above the grandstands during practices

shortDefinitions: person in auto racing who tells driver by radio what is happening on track

definitions: a person employed by a company or business to keep watch on employees or customers.
shortDefinitions: person employed by company or business to keep watch on employees or customers
